title: Keys not working
body: Not sure what's wrong here. Sometimes when I go to click spells it won't work. Like I can click QWER but then the mouse won't click to release the spell. I know it's not my mouse or keyboard. When I click on escape to bring up the menu then exit right away the spells will work for awhile then they'll stop again. Any ideas?

replies.body: It sounds like you may be experiencing some sort of *packet loss* or *high packet buffering*. Do you notice a delay in anything happening on the screen during your matches that this issue happens in?

No :/ it seemed perfectly normal besides this issue. Riot support has recommended I try patching my launcher and fixing some config files which I'll do now. Hopefully that works! It's been happening throughout different updates for months

Gotcha. Those steps are certainly not a bad starting point. 

Let me know if they caused any change in your issue.
